original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho sambahulā kosalakā brāhmaṇamahāsālā jiṇṇā vuḍḍhā mahallakā addhagatā vayoanuppattā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho sambahulā kosalakāḥ brāhmaṇa mahāsālāḥ jiṇṇāḥ vuḍḍhāḥ mahallakāḥ addha gatāḥ vayaḥ anuppattāḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodisu

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnāḥ kho te brāhmaṇa mahā sālāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: “sandissanti nu kho, bho gotama, etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇadhamme”ti?
analyzed: sandissanti nu khalu bho gotama etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānam brāhmaṇānam brāhmaṇa dhamma iti

original: “Na kho, brāhmaṇā, sandissanti etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇadhamme”ti.
analyzed: na kho brāhmaṇā sandissanti etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇānam brāhmaṇānam brāhmaṇa dhammā iti

original: “Sādhu no bhavaṁ gotamo porāṇānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ brāhmaṇadhammaṁ bhāsatu, sace bhoto gotamassa agarū”ti.
analyzed: sādhu naḥ bhavam gotamaḥ porāṇānam brāhmaṇānam brāhmaṇa dhammam bhāsatu sace bhoto gotamassa

original: “Tena hi, brāhmaṇā, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi brāhmaṇā suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhoti kho te brāhmaṇa mahā sālāḥ bhagavato paccassosu
rathe ca a jañña sa yutte
rathe ca a jañña sa yutte

original: Evaṁ vutte, te brāhmaṇamahāsālā bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte te brāhmaṇa mahā sālāḥ bhagavantam etat avocuḥ

original: upāsake no bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇaṁ gate”ti.
analyzed: upāsake naḥ bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupete saraṇam gatā iti
